title: Part1 Writing(30 minutes)
content: Directions: For this part, you are allowed 30 minutes to write a short essay on how to best handle the relationship between doctors and patients. Your essay should discuss effective communication, empathy, and the significance of trust in the doctor-patient relationship. Provide insights into fostering a positive and collaborative healthcare environment. You should write at least 120 words but no more than 180 words.
